testsuite.name: When a function returns a non-empty item

testcase.name: Expecting an empty sequence (no @href, @select or child node) should be Failure
Expecting empty sequence using @select should be Failure

testsuite.name: When a function returns an empty sequence

testcase.name: Expecting an empty sequence (no @href, @select or child node) should be Success
Expecting empty sequence using @select should be Success
